text: Ndhlovu is an African surname that may refer to: *Kelvin Ndhlovu (born 1985), Zambian squash player *Lepono Ndhlovu (born 1986), Ugandan cricketer *Pardon Ndhlovu (born 1987), Zimbabwean marathon runner *Samuel Ndhlovu (1937–2001), Zambian football player and coach Category:Bantu-language surnames
title: Ndhlovu
